trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The zergling has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

trait.name: Burrow
entries: By spending 1 minute digging, the zergling can burrow through solid rock up to 5 feet below the surface, leaving no trace above, and completely submerging itself. While burrowed, the zergling has total cover, can't move, and can't take actions other than to unburrow as a bonus action. If the zergling takes 10 or more damage while burrowed, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC equal to 5 + the damage taken, or be forced to unburrow as a reaction.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The zergling has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the zergling's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The zergling makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.
